description: Ottawa officials said on Monday they are closing roads and calling in reinforcements to keep anti-government "freedom" protesters from disrupting Canada Day festivities, which are being held for the first time in three years on Friday.
title: Ottawa police call in Canada Day reinforcements for 'freedom' protests - Reuters Canada
content: OTTAWA, June 27 (Reuters) - Ottawa officials said on Monday they are closing roads and calling in reinforcements to keep anti-government "freedom" protesters from disrupting Canada Day festivities, w… [+2144 chars]

description: Denmark and Canada will divide the small, uninhabited island in the Arctic known as Hans Island, ending an almost 50-year long ownership spat, in a largely symbolic act of diplomacy designed to avoid tensions in the high North.
title: Canada and Denmark divide small Arctic island, ending ownership dispute - Reuters Canada
content: COPENHAGEN, June 14 (Reuters) - Denmark and Canada will divide the small, uninhabited island in the Arctic known as Hans Island, ending an almost 50-year long ownership spat, in a largely symbolic ac… [+2544 chars]

description: Canada on Monday announced more measures in response to Russia's invasion of Ukraine, including additional sanctions and a ban on the export of technologies that could help improve Russia's defense manufacturing capability.
title: Canada to impose additional sanctions, ban tech export to Russia -statement - Reuters Canada
